snippet: David Virelles, his band Continuum and a couple of guest performers are filling the Village Vanguard with sounds that roam far and wide.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performance by jazz drummer David Virelles and his band Continuum at Village Vanguard.
lead_paragraph: David Virelles, his band Continuum and a couple of guest performers are filling the Village Vanguard with sounds that roam far and wide.

headline.seo: David Virelles Continuum, at the Village Vanguard
headline.main: A Melting Pot of Sounds, With Latin Spices
headline.print_headline: A Melting Pot of Sounds, With Latin Spices
